verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> [Tle-Da-Vid[A Psalm] of David אָ֘מַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar hath said נָבָ֣ל <S%H5036><s%> na-Val The fool בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-bo in his heart אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein There אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; [There is] no God הִֽשְׁחִ֗יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> hish-Chi-tu, They are corrupt הִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ <S%H8581><s%> hit-'I-vu they have done abominable עֲלִילָ֗ה <S%H5949><s%> 'a-li-Lah, works אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein is no עֹֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-seh- [there is] none that doeth טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> Tov. good

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ <S%H8064><s%> mish-sha-ma-Yim from heaven הִשְׁקִ֪יף <S%H8259><s%> hish-Kif looked down עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- upon the children אָ֫דָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of men לִ֭רְאוֹת <S%H7200><s%> Lir-'ot to see הֲיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> ha-Yesh if there מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <S%H7919><s%> mas-Kil; were any that did understand דֹּ֝רֵשׁ <S%H1875><s%> Do-resh [and] seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. God

הַכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol have all סָר֮ <S%H5493><s%> sar They are all gone aside יַחְדָּ֪ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav they are [all] together נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ <S%H444><s%> ne-'e-La-chu become filthy אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein There עֹֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-seh- [there is] none that doeth ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov; good אֵ֝֗ין <S%H369><s%> 'Ein, is no גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- even אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. no not one

הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not יָדְעוּ֮ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U no knowledge כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <S%H6466><s%> po-'a-Lei Have all the workers אָ֥וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven of iniquity אֹכְלֵ֣י <S%H398><s%> 'o-che-Lei ;who eat up עַ֭מִּי <S%H5971><s%> 'Am-mi my people אָ֣כְלוּ <S%H398><s%> 'A-che-lu [as] they eat לֶ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem; bread יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh not upon the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not קָרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-'u. and call

שָׁ֤ם׀ <S%H8033><s%> sham There פָּ֣חֲדוּ <S%H6342><s%> Pa-cha-du fear פָ֑חַד <S%H6343><s%> Fa-chad; There were they in great כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, for God בְּד֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> be-Dor [is] in the generation צַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik. of the righteous

עֲצַת־ <S%H6098><s%> 'a-tzat- the counsel עָנִ֥י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni of the poor תָבִ֑ישׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ta-Vi-shu; Ye have shamed כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki But יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh because the LORD מַחְסֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4268><s%> mach-Se-hu. [is] his refuge

מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten Oh that מִצִּיּוֹן֮ <S%H6726><s%> mitz-tzi-yOn [were come] out of Zion יְשׁוּעַ֪ת <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'At the salvation יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> yis-Ra-'El of Israel בְּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> be-Shuv bringeth back יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh when the LORD שְׁב֣וּת <S%H7622><s%> she-Vut the captivity עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo; of his people יָגֵ֥ל <S%H1523><s%> ya-Gel shall rejoice יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob יִשְׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach shall be glad יִשְׂרָֽאֵל׃ <S%H3478><s%> yis-Ra-'el [and] Israel
